definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityCreeper</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntitySlime</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">MAGIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2.5</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:PlantSlaying</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
